Condor::

Condor continued running. Plants, trees and things like that could be 
an advantage to him, he just continued walking, but every step was 
difficult to him. With every step he looked around hoping find a 
hideplace.  

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Damnit!  I keep forgetting to include my other chars in 
posts!!!
> ::Decapitron/Legtrap/Headshot::
> 
>      Decapitron sped off towards where some mechfluid led, and also 
where he thought he saw Condor go,into a big forest. 
> 
>      "Damn, missed!!" Legtrap said,"Headshot, maybe you can get him 
in your sights?"
> 
>       Headshot nodded, then pulled out his sniper gun.
> 
>       "Hey Decap, I need ya to get close to that Maximal scrap-
pile, so I can get a shot at his head," Headshot said.
> 
>        "Right," Decapitron said, then he speeded up to get to 
Condor.  
> 
>         "Oh, and by the way, don't call me Decap," He muttered.
